name: Terminal Error
storyline:
Deep in the forest, there is a hidden research centre known for its cutting edge advancements in technology. Most nights at the facility are uneventful, but some unfortunate circumstances seem to have befallen the secret base this time…

Trapped in the facility with horrors of monstrous proportions, you must navigate through the haunting hallways of the research centre alone and helpless. Armed with only a torchlight in hand, you must solve puzzles, avoid enemies, and find your way out before it is too late.

Will you make it out alive, or will you end up like everyone else?
summary: Preyed upon by grotesque experiments, you must find a way out of the research centre alive in this first-person point-and-click horror game. However, to escape, you must first delve hopelessly deeper into the maddening corridors of the facility.
